amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-115 to require the GAO Study in Section 5 to also be made available to the public online.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
